extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • TicTacToe

        public TicTacToe(int board_size,
                 int inline,
                 int max_levels)
        Constructor for TicTacToe that specifies the size, symbols in-line, and maximum levels.
        Parameters:
        board_size - size of game board
        inline - number of symbols in-line needed to win the game
        max_levels - maximum levels of the game tree that will be explored by the program

      • wins

        public boolean wins(char symbol)
        Method checks if the player has won the game. Checks all possible combinations of winning; horizontal, vertical and diagonal
        Parameters:
        symbol - associated symbol represented as a character
        Returns:
        true if k adjacent occurrences of symbol

      • isDraw

        public boolean isDraw()
        Method checks if the game is a draw.
        Returns:
        true if gameBoard has no empty positions left and no player has won the game

      • evalBoard

        public int evalBoard()
        Method which evaluates the result of the game board.
        Returns:
        3 if the computer has won
